Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In most patients with isolated unilateral retinoblastoma , tumor development is initiated by somatic inactivation of both alleles of the RB1 gene .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Retinoblastoma |
| Unilateral retinoblastoma |

Note: "Retinoblastoma" and "unilateral retinoblastoma" are both considered diseases in this context, as they are both referring to medical conditions.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Retinoblastoma |

The entity "unilateral retinoblastoma" is not included in the table as it is not a distinct disease, but rather a description of the location of the disease.
